name: v1.0.0
body:
## Protovalidate is now v1.0

After two years of development, Protovalidate has reached v1.0, marking our commitment to stability and production readiness. 
Read more in our [blog post](https://buf.build/blog/protovalidate-v1). Get started at https://protovalidate.com.


## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate-cc", version = "1.0.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "protovalidate-cc",
    sha256 = "dc3edf0f6ab0faba0a94c41aca01667666c16be444c47313ed59360ec3819a43",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-cc-1.0.0",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/releases/download/v1.0.0/protovalidate-cc-1.0.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```

### What's Changed

There are no functional changes compared to the previous release.
* Update protovalidate by @srikrsna-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/129

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.9.0...v1.0.0

name: v1.0.0-rc.6
body:
This release is compatible with the [v0.14.0](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/tag/v0.14.0) release of Protovalidate.

## Breaking changes

We want validation rules to be easy to understand for authors and consumers. To simplify Protovalidate, we are renaming an option and remove two others. This is a breaking change, and you will have to update your Protobuf files if they use the relevant options:

- `IGNORE_IF_UNPOPULATED` is renamed to `IGNORE_IF_ZERO_VALUE`.
See https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/397 for details.
- `(buf.validate.message).disabled` is removed.
You can replace it by adding `IGNORE_ALWAYS` to every field of the message. See https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/394 for details.
- `IGNORE_IF_DEFAULT_VALUE` is removed.
In most cases, you can replace it with `IGNORE_IF_ZERO_VALUE`. See https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/396 for details.

## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate-cc", version = "1.0.0-rc.6")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "protovalidate-cc",
    sha256 = "3595dfb8840a93f45b18a7368486734ec6dc30479e3f2245d1a1d82b9c8d2a64",
    strip_prefix = "protovalidate-cc-1.0.0-rc.6",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/releases/download/v1.0.0-rc.6/protovalidate-cc-1.0.0-rc.6.tar.gz",
    ],
)
```


## What's Changed
* Fix Bazel WORKSPACE instructions in readme and release message by @wheals in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/111
* Update README to be consistent with core Protovalidate repo by @jrinehart-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/112
* Bump bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr from 0.2.1 to 0.2.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/113
* Use tagged BCR release workflow by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/117
* Update count for new protobuf version by @FoxMoss in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/115
* Update protovalidate by @srikrsna-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/116

## New Contributors
* @wheals made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/111
* @FoxMoss made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/115

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v1.0.0-rc.5...v1.0.0-rc.6

name: v0.9.0
body:
This release is compatible with the [v0.14.0](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/releases/tag/v0.14.0) release of Protovalidate.

## Breaking changes

We want validation rules to be easy to understand for authors and consumers. To simplify Protovalidate, we are renaming an option and remove two others. This is a breaking change, and you will have to update your Protobuf files if they use the relevant options:

- `IGNORE_IF_UNPOPULATED` is renamed to `IGNORE_IF_ZERO_VALUE`.
See https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/397 for details.
- `(buf.validate.message).disabled` is removed.
You can replace it by adding `IGNORE_ALWAYS` to every field of the message. See https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/394 for details.
- `IGNORE_IF_DEFAULT_VALUE` is removed.
In most cases, you can replace it with `IGNORE_IF_ZERO_VALUE`. See https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/pull/396 for details.

## `MODULE.bazel` Usage
```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "protovalidate-cc", version = "0.9.0")
```

## `WORKSPACE` Usage
```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "protovalidate-cc",

    urls = [
```

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.8.0...v0.9.0

name: v0.6.0
body:
## Breaking Changes
As of protovalidate v0.11.0, the term "constraint" has been removed in favor of using the term "rule" to universally refer to rule values, rule definitions, and so forth. This has resulted in some identifiers in protovalidate-cc changing as well. The public type `buf::validate::ConstraintViolation` is now `buf::validate::RuleViolation`.

Some of the validation behavior has changed. In most cases, these changes are backwards-compatible, i.e. values that previously passed validation should continue to pass validation. However, the rules for e-mail validation have changed. protovalidate-cc now uses the [e-mail address grammar specified by the WHATWG HTML specification](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/input.html#valid-e-mail-address) across all implementations. Previously, the e-mail validation varied between implementations, although we had previously adopted part of the HTML e-mail address grammar previously (in that case, loosening the restrictions a bit) - now we are fully adhering to that grammar. This may result in some values that were formerly considered valid to be considered invalid, but in practice, it is expected to be very unlikely to encounter such values.

## What's Changed
A wide range of improvements are present in this release. We are now using cel-cpp v0.11.0 and we have reduced the set of custom patches we carry; now the only patches we carry for cel-cpp are to add support for Windows and CMake. We no longer depend on BSD sockets on UNIX or winsock32 on Windows, as we replaced code that uses the system networking stack to validate addresses, instead using built-in parsers that closely follow the relevant RFC grammar, allowing protovalidate implementations to be more consistent, especially across platforms. The developer experience is improved as well: when using CMake on protovalidate-cc directly (as opposed to embedding it within another project,) we will automatically set up `compile_commands.json` in the current directory by default, enabling clangd and other clang tools to function while you work on protovalidate-cc. We also now have support for bzlmod, but since cel-cpp is not in the BCR, we can not put protovalidate-cc in the BCR and you will need to manually set up an archive override for cel-cpp.

* Update copyright years by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/77
* Prepare GitHub docs for shift to buf.build/docs by @jrinehart-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/71
* CMake: Cleanup and improvements by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/74
* CMake: Set up compile_commands.json automatically by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/78
* Implement unified IPv4 and IPv6 parsers by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/79, https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/85
* Implement unified e-mail address validation by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/81
* Implement unified URI validation by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/82
* Fix hostname, port, and enum validation by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/83
* Fix URI host parsing and let isHostAndPort reject leading zeros in port number by @timostamm in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/87
* Update cel-cpp to v0.11.0 by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/86
* Initial bzlmod support by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/88
* New conformance fixes by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/89
* Upgrade to protovalidate v0.10.3, v0.10.4, v0.11.0 by @smaye81 in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/73, @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/84, @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/90
* Rename constraint -> rule globally by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/91

## New Contributors
* @smaye81 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/73
* @jrinehart-buf made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/71
* @timostamm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/87

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

name: v0.5.0
body:
Adds support for CMake. CMake support is still considered somewhat experimental, but should be usable for embedding protovalidate-cc into projects. For more information about how to use protovalidate with CMake, check the [README information](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/tree/main/cmake#readme).

Bazel 8 is now also supported, but it requires `WORKSPACE` mode to be enabled. We're interested in getting Bzlmod support as soon as possible, but we're waiting for our dependencies to add Bzlmod support right now.

## What's Changed
* Update Buf logo in README by @smallsamantha in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/65
* Update CEL to v0.10.0, update intertwined dependencies by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/67
* Support Bazel 8, sans bzlmod by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/68
* Remove support for deprecated options by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/69
* Implement shared dependencies system by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/70
* CMake support by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/72

## New Contributors
* @smallsamantha made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/65

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
## Breaking Changes
The `buf::validate::Validator::Validate` method no longer returns a `StatusOr` containing a `buf::validate::Violations` message, but a `StatusOr` containing an instance of the new `buf::validate::ValidationResult` class. **In most cases, using the `proto()` method of the violation is all that needs to be done:**

```diff
     auto result = validator.Validate(message).value();
     for (int i = 0; i < result.violations_size(); i++) {
-        puts(result.violation(i).GetMessage().c_str())
+        puts(result.violation(i).proto().GetMessage().c_str())
     }
```

`buf::validate::ValidationResult` itself also has a `proto()` method that returns the protobuf `buf::validate::Violations` message equivalent.

----

The new `buf::validate::ConstraintViolation` class provides additional in-memory information about the violation which cannot be serialized to the wire:
- `field_value()`: Returns an `absl::optional` containing a `buf::validate::ProtoField` pointing to the value of the field failing validation, if there is a field corresponding to the violation.
- `rule_value()`: Returns an `absl::optional` containing a `buf::validate::ProtoField` pointing to the value of the rule failing validation, if there is a rule corresponding to the violation.

Take, for example, the following protobuf message schema:

```proto
message User {
    string email = 1 [(buf.validate.field).string.email = true];
}
```

If you try to validate the message `User` with `email` set to `"invalid"`, the violation's `field_value()->variant()` will contain `"invalid"` and the `rule_value()->variant()` will contain `true`.

Some violations do not correspond directly to a field, such as a message constraint failure; in these cases, the `field_value()` will return `absl::nullopt`.

## What's Changed
* Implement structured field and rule paths for violations by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/63
* Add field and rule value to violations by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/64


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
Adds support for custom predefined field constraints. See [the protovalidate documentation](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate/blob/main/docs/predefined-constraints.md) for more information.

Updates protovalidate to v0.8.1. **Note that this is a breaking change.** You may need to make some adjustments to your code:

- Code that includes the headers `buf/validate/expression.pb.h` or `buf/validate/priv/private.pb.h` now only needs to include `buf/validate/validate.pb.h`.
- `buf::validate::priv::field` was moved to `buf::validate::predefined` and is no longer considered an internal implementation detail.

> [!NOTE]
> This release requires Protobuf v27+. Depending on your `WORKSPACE` configuration, you may not have a new enough Protobuf version to support Protobuf Editions. For correct functionality, ensure that you set up a repository rule to import a newer version of Protobuf, as well as setting the [`--proto_compiler`](https://bazel.build/reference/command-line-reference#flag--proto_compiler) and [`--proto_toolchain_for_*`](https://bazel.build/reference/command-line-reference#flag--proto_toolchain_for_cc) Bazel build flags as necessary (see [here](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/blob/0e320b9/.bazelrc#L5-L6) for an example.)

## What's Changed
* Implement predefined field constraints by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/61


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
Adds support for the `string.host_and_port` CEL utility function and Protobuf Editions, and bumps the versions of various dependencies.

> [!NOTE]
> This release requires Protobuf v27+. Depending on your `WORKSPACE` configuration, you may not have a new enough Protobuf version to support Protobuf Editions. For correct functionality, ensure that you set up a repository rule to import a newer version of Protobuf, as well as setting the [`--proto_compiler`](https://bazel.build/reference/command-line-reference#flag--proto_compiler) and [`--proto_toolchain_for_*`](https://bazel.build/reference/command-line-reference#flag--proto_toolchain_for_cc) Bazel build flags as necessary (see [here](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/blob/0e320b9/.bazelrc#L5-L6) for an example.)

## What's Changed
* Bump actions/setup-go from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/47
* Add string.host_and_port support by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/52
* Create add-to-project workflow by @chrispine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/53
* Makefile: fix bazel -> $(BAZEL) for some targets by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/56
* Add macOS testing to CI by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/57
* Protobuf Editions support by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/58
* Bump morrisoncole/pr-lint-action from 1.7.0 to 1.7.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/55
* Bump actions/cache from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/51

## New Contributors
* @chrispine made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/53

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update protovalidate dep by @Alfus in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/31
* Only compute field paths for violations by @Alfus in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/32
* Update readme with protovalidate-python by @marekbuild in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/34
* Update to 0.2.2 by @Alfus in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/36
* Support 'for_key' by @Alfus in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/37
* Update readme with protovalidate-java link by @marekbuild in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/38
* Upgrade protovalidate dependencies by @elliotmjackson in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/39
* Add isInf and isNan by @Alfus in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/40
* Update to v0.4.2 by @Alfus in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/42
* Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/44
* Add isIpPrefix by @paina in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/45
* Update required/ignore_empty behavior to match spec by @rodaine in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/46
* Add .bazelversion to pin Bazel version by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/48

## New Contributors
* @marekbuild made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/34
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/44
* @paina made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/45
* @rodaine made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/46
* @jchadwick-buf made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/48

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/commits/v0.1.0
